title: Flight Diverted After Passenger Is Seen With Box Cutter, Airline Says
description: A Cincinnati-to-Tampa flight landed in Atlanta, where a man who had threatened to stab people was taken into custody. A second box cutter was found in his carry-on bag, officials said.
dc:creator: Vimal Patel and McKenna Oxenden
media:description: A Frontier Airlines plane in Miami in 2021. A Frontier flight from Cincinnati to Tampa, Fla., was diverted to Atlanta on Friday after a passenger was seen with a box cutter, the airline said.
